com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.cfn

Class CarrotAwsCloudForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.CarrotAws
        • com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.cfn.CarrotAwsCloudForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate, CarrotAwsCloudFormDelete

    public abstract class CarrotAwsCloudForm
extends CarrotAws

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String stackEndpoint
      AWS CloudFormation optional api end point url which controls amazon region selection; when omitted, will be constructed from CarrotAws.amazonRegion
      protected String stackName
      AWS CloudFormation stack name; must be unique under your aws account / region
      protected String stackServerId
      AWS CloudFormation amazon security credentials stored in maven settings.xml under server id entry; username="Access Key ID", password="Secret Access Key";
      protected Long stackTimeout
      AWS CloudFormation operation timeout; seconds

      • Fields inherited from class com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.CarrotAws

        amazonRegion, project, settings

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

        ROLE
